services.title: COPD treatment planning review
services.description: provides one or more personalised, conflict-safe COPD care plan proposals. Each care plan identifies the interactions that were found while adding patient-specific GOLD-based recommendations and the actions applied to mitigate them.

services.title: COPD severity assessment
services.description: CDS service providing personalised COPD assessment using COPD symptom severity measurements and existing COPD-related clinical data

services.title: COPD careplan select
services.description: CDS service providing personalised care plan(s) to treat COPD symptoms taking into account existing comorbidites and patient-specific data

services.title: COPD severity assessment
services.description: CDS service providing personalised COPD assessment using COPD symptom severity measurements and existing COPD-related clinical data
